methods.name: _handleLogin
methods.body: setState(() => isLoggingIn = true); await Future.delayed(Duration(seconds: 1)); if (email.isNotEmpty && password.isNotEmpty) { await prefs.setBool('isLoggedIn', true); Navigator.pushReplacementNamed(context, '/inventory'); } else { setState(() { isLoggingIn = false; errorMessage = 'Invalid credentials'; }); }

methods.name: _fetchInventory
methods.body: setState(() => isLoading = true); try { final response = await http.get(Uri.parse('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts')); await Future.delayed(Duration(seconds: 1)); final data = json.decode(response.body) as List; setState(() { inventoryItems = data.map((e) => InventoryItem.fromJson(e)).toList(); filteredItems = inventoryItems; isLoading = false; }); } catch (e) { setState(() => isLoading = false); ScaffoldMessenger.of(context).showSnackBar(SnackBar(content: Text('Failed to load inventory'))); }

methods.name: _filterInventory
methods.body: setState(() { searchQuery = query; filteredItems = query.isEmpty ? inventoryItems : inventoryItems.where((item) => item.title.toLowerCase().contains(query.toLowerCase())).toList(); });

methods.name: _buildItemCard
methods.body: return OpenContainer(closedElevation: 2, closedShape: RoundedRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(12)), closedColor: Colors.transparent, closedBuilder: (context, action) => _GlassCard(item: item, onTap: action), openBuilder: (context, action) => ItemDetailScreen(item: item), transitionDuration: Duration(milliseconds: 300));

methods.name: _showEditBottomSheet
methods.body: showModalBottomSheet(context: context, isScrollControlled: true, backgroundColor: Colors.transparent, builder: (context) => _EditBottomSheet(item: item, onItemUpdated: (updatedItem) { setState(() { item = updatedItem; }); Navigator.pop(context); }); );

methods.name: _confirmDelete
methods.body: showDialog(context: context, builder: (context) => AlertDialog(backgroundColor: Color(0xFFFAFAFA), title: Text('Delete Item?'), content: Text('Are you certain you want to delete this item?'), actions: [ TextButton(onPressed: () => Navigator.pop(context), child: Text('Cancel')), TextButton(onPressed: () async { setState(() => isDeleting = true); await widget.onDelete(item.id); Navigator.pop(context); Navigator.pop(context); }, child: Text('Delete', style: TextStyle(color: Color(0xFFE57373)))) ]));

methods.name: takePhoto
methods.body: setState(() => isCapturing = true); HapticFeedback.heavyImpact(); await Future.delayed(Duration(milliseconds: 100)); final image = await cameraController.takePicture(); await widget.onPhotoCaptured(image.path); Navigator.pop(context);

methods.name: _onBarcodeDetected
methods.body: if (!isScanning) return; setState(() => isScanning = false); HapticFeedback.mediumImpact(); ConfettiAnimation.play(); await Future.delayed(Duration(milliseconds: 500)); widget.onBarcodeDetected(barcode.rawValue); Navigator.pop(context);
